sentences.en: Correct speech is an earmark of the educated man.
sentences.cn: 正确的谈吐是受教育者的特征.

sentences.en: Davis's solo work exhibits all the earmarks of his style: it is hesitant, tentative, spare.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯的独奏曲尽展其风格特征：犹豫、迟疑、俭朴。

sentences.en: He also undertook to earmark $ 235 billion in government expenditure on infrastructure projects within five years.
sentences.cn: 同时承诺在五年内投资二千三百五十亿元进行基建.

sentences.en: I will earmark this money for your research.
sentences.cn: 我将为你的研究指拨一笔款项.

sentences.en: Mechanically, electrically, behaviorally and cosmetically, our paired sounding boards are a genuine earmark of our species.
sentences.cn: 从物理 、 电子 、 行为以及化学各方面来说, 我们的这对传声板都是我们这一种族的天然标记.

sentences.en: The company has decided to earmark a portion of this year's profits to invest in securities.
sentences.cn: 公司决定从今年的利润中提存一部分用作证券投资.

sentences.en: The project has already received a $ 500, 000 grant from the Polk Bros. foundation.
sentences.cn: 这个项目(Obama的earmark)已经接到PolkBros基金会50万美元的捐赠.

sentences.en: The school has decided to earmark 20 percent of its funds for book purchases.
sentences.cn: 学校决定拨出20%的经费用于购买课本.

sentences.en: Who fought against wasteful and earmark spending?
sentences.cn: 谁在和浪费的拨款项目花销作斗争?

trans.tran_en: The earmark of something or someone is their most typical quality or feature
